name: iDaggers
description:
Get ready  to frantically iDaggers for hours.  iDaggers is a an intense platformer that will actually challenge you.  If things get too heated hit your Fairy for slow motion and unleash a furious flurry of blades.

＊  12 POWERFUL WEAPONS
Throw an endless stream of upgradable Daggers and mix in that perfect AOE Bomb or chaotic Rocket.  

＊  FAIRY SLOW MOTION IS EPIC EVERY TIME.
Utilize your Fairy's slow motion whenever things get too overwhelming.  She's your only hope.

＊  TONS OF CUTE BADDIES WITH NOT SO CUTE ATTACKS
Look forward to new enemies and figuring out how to deal with their crazy assaults.

＊  20 RICH SOUNDTRACKS
Pop in headphones and you'll be completely in the zone, especially during Boss fights.

＊  7 JAW DROPPING BOSSES 
Be prepared for some wild boss battles that will require strategy and pro moves.

＊   INNOVATIVE TOUCH SCREEN CONTROLS THAT WORK
Get a feel for the dual stick controls that feel easy and natural.


Some Pro Tips!
√  Use slo motion Fairy and weapons frequently.  They recharge fast.  
√  Hold down to have your Fairy shield you.  Damage lowers her meter instead.
√  Toggle Auto Fire on the top left as you quickly master the controls.
